item.title: Latent Markov Models for modeling customer spending dynamics
item.dc:creator: Alessandro
item.description: In this post we will apply Latent Markov Models to model the customers portfolio composition of a retailer. To fit the models we will use the R package LMest

item.title: Media Mix Modeling via Dynamic Linear Regression
item.dc:creator: Alessandro
item.description: In this post we discuss the application of Dynamic Linear Regression model to Media Mix Modeling. We adopt a state space representation of the linear regression model and use the dlm R package to fit the model to a media mix modeling example.
